Package com.redis.ds.ds_content

Class Content

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_content.Content
public class Content extends Object
The Content class captures the constants, enumerated types and utility methods for the content text extraction package.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole

  • Method Details

    • hashId

      public static String hashId(String aPathFileName)
      Generates a unique hash string using the MD5 algorithm using the path/file name.
      Parameters:
      aPathFileName - Name of path/file to base hash on.
      Returns:
      Unique hash string.
